subject: Real credit for real people
body: upStar Financial, LLC markets Purpose Money SM products, including consumer credit cards and other products, on behalf of financial institutions. Decisions regarding credit approval are made solely by the individual financial institutions providing these products. Please do not reply to this message. If you have questions about Purpose Money  SM products, please visit our website at  www.PurposeMoney.com. This is an advertisement. If you would rather not receive these promotional email updates about Purpose Money SM products, click here to be removed from our mailing list. upStar Financial LLC, 245 Perimeter Center Parkway, suite 700, Atlanta, GA 30346 (C)2007, upStar Financial, LLC. All rights reserved. Applicant can only receive a maximum of one card.
